extra.enrollment_requirement: COREQUISITE    BCHM 310/6.0 or BCHM 315/3.0 or BIOL 334/3.0 or permission of the Course Coordinator.

basic.description: The general principles and mechanism of immune reaction. Immunochemical and immunobiological aspects of antibody formation and cell-mediated immunity in health and disease will be considered.
basic.subject: MICR
basic.title: Immunology
